Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Phira usa ne unham nu tukare tukare kara dita sinham unham de ika vade tom ilava tam jo uha usa vala puchana la'i dhi'ana dena
Unham ne kiha ki sadi'am murati'am nala ajiha kisa ne kita hai. Besaka uha bara vada zalima hai
Lokam ne kiha ki asim ika naujavana nu unham bare kujha kahidi'am suni'am si, jisanu ibarahima kiha janda hai
Unham ne kiha ki usa nu sare lokam de sahamane hazira karom tam jo usa nu puchi'a jave
Unham ne kiha he ibarahima! Ki sade pujakam de nala tusim ajiha iha kita hai
Ibarahima ne kiha, sagom unham de usa vade ne ajiha kita hai tam usa nu pucha la'u jekara iha bolada hove
Phira unham ne apane mana vica soci'a ate uha apasa vica ika dusare nu kahina lage ki asala vica apam hi jhutha upara ham
Phira (unham ne) apane siram nu jhuka li'a. He ibarahima! Tusi' janade ho ki iha bolade nahim
Ibarahima ne kiha, ki tusim alaha tom binham ajihi'am cizam di puja karade hom jihari'am na tuhanu ko'i labha pahuca sakadi'am hana ate na hani
Afasosa hai tuhade upara vi ate inham cizam (butam) upara vi jinham di tusim alaha tom binham puja karade ho. Ki tusim samajhade nahim
Unham ne kiha ki isa nu aga vica jala devo ate apane pujakam di madada karom, jekara tusim kujha karana cahude ho
Asim kiha hai aga! Tu ibarahima la'i thadi, santa ate surakhi'ata bana ja
Ate unham ne usa nala bura'i karani cahi tam asim' unham lokam nu asafala bana dita
Ate asim usa nu ate luta nu baca ke usa dharati vala lai ga'e jisa vica asim sasara vali'am la'i barakatam rakhi'am hana
Ate asim_usa nu isahaka dita ate nala hi yakuba. Ate asim inham sari'am nu sadacari sana'i'a
